title: WTB - WTT - Tinker Bat Off AB, Cycle, EPDG, Fact 42

posts.post_title: WTB - WTT - Tinker Bat Off AB, Cycle, EPDG, Fact 42
posts.post_content: Trying to put together a back run. Prefer mid-higher grade, but not picky on these backs. Also interested in higher grade (6 or better) Piedmont and sweet corporal.  Please PM or email at [url]rhotchkiss@horizonlandco.com[/url]

Bump.  

Motivated and will pay well for Evers Bat off AB, Cycle or Pied Fact 42
